isis.stitle: CAB: 5000i AND 9000i CONVENTIONAL - INSTALL - Install SUN SHADE

svcproc.title: Install SUN SHADE
svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 17 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position sun shade (Item 3) at cab roof and connect wiring harness electrical connector (Item 8) to cab wiring harness connector coming from wiring harness hole (Item 7) in cab roof.

Position sun shade (Item 3) on cab roof and install three hex head flanged mounting screws (Item 4) through clearance light openings and attach sun shade to day cab roof (Item 5) or Pro-sleeper® roof (Item 6).
Position right and left side sun shade clearance lights (Item 1) and center sun shade clearance light (Item 2) onto sun shade (Item 3) and install mounting hardware attaching them to sun shade.
